attributes.action: The Tories have failed - Call for an urgent General Election
attributes.additional_details:
Austerity, Brexit, mishandled pandemic behaviors, rocketing inflation, crumbling schools and an NHS on its knees are the results of out-of-touch officials who are more concerned with lining their own pockets and that of their friends and family than doing the right thing for those they serve.

Leadership is non-existent and more akin to mismanagement of the country. We have no serious voice in the world community and a once great empire has no more influence than a minor third-world nation
attributes.background:
I want the government to do the right thing and fall on its sword, resign itself and call a general election so the people of this once envied country can go to the polls and choose a leader, a voice and a change. 

After 13 years the bench has been used and whats left is not capable nor honorable

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: 'Call an immediate general election'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
